channel.title: autumn on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in autumn on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.9: Palo Alto and Cousins
item.description: Two days after that I went to meet a member of TransForm – an organisation that works on improving public transport http://www.transformca.org/landing-page/our-approachbecause one of the events I had previously attended was hosted by them and I had taken a short survey saying I wouldn’t mind being contacted for more information/clarification of my ideas.

item.title: LOG 2.1: Autumn
item.description: 22nd September 2011 This morning on the radio, I heard a weather report unlike any other. The lady was shouting in German with even some ‘bad words’ which I could recognise about the summer which had more than its share of rain and how horrible it was that the bad weather was continuing into Autumn.

item.title: Autumn dance
item.description: It is time for leaves to bid farewell to the trees they leave Where they have lived for two happy seasons Leaving is an elation

item.title: Misty Night
item.description: On this misty night Trees are backlit mystically She cannot welcome Winter with any warmth Yet, when you are near The biting wind is forgiven

item.title: Autumn Garden
item.description: However dim the light, The leaves glow bright In the Autumn Garden Almost as if they had a light of their own Golden yellow, orange
